string.text: Burn Shit through the Context Menu
Show "burn" and "burn all" items in the inventory's context menu. You need to be near (within 3m of) a fire to do this.
Burn Shit by Dragging and Dropping
Burn items you drag and drop from the inventory onto a campfire. You need to be next to (within 2m of) a fire to do this.
Allow burning of items flagged with "quest_item = true". If you enable this, just be careful not to burn something you might need for a quest.
Allow burning of items flagged with "can_trade = false". I threw this option in but don't really know if disabling it is useful.
Choose to show a "burn all" context menu item always, never, or only when right clicking multiple-item stacks.
